How many people are affected by lacrimo-auriculo-dento-digital syndrome ?,LADD syndrome appears to be a rare condition; at least 60 cases have been described in the scientific literature.,GHR,lacrimo-auriculo-dento-digital syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to lacrimo-auriculo-dento-digital syndrome ?,"Mutations in the FGFR2, FGFR3, or FGF10 gene c
